Community Learning

Group Mentorship

The same high-quality SMC curriculum, but in a small group of motivated traders. Learn from each other and from me at an affordable price.

Affordable

Access to professional SMC training for a fraction of the price of 1-on-1 guidance.

Small Groups

Maximum 8-10 people per group so everyone gets personal attention and feedback.

Community

Learn from fellow students, share experiences and motivate each other to stay consistent.

Flexible Schedule

Weekly group calls at fixed times with recordings for when you can't make it.

Group vs 1-on-1: What's the difference?

Group Mentorship Benefits

Much more affordable than 1-on-1 guidance
Learn from different trading styles
Community support and accountability
Different perspectives and questions
Networking with fellow students
Less pressure, more relaxed learning environment

What you miss vs 1-on-1

Less personal attention per session
No custom curriculum
No WhatsApp support between sessions
Less time for individual trade reviews
No flexibility in session timing
Focus is on group needs, not individual

What do you get?

Weekly group call (90 min)
Q&A sessions with the group
Homework feedback and reviews
Community chat and support
Access to recordings and material
Monthly group challenges
Networking with fellow students
